name: Samurai Delve
description:
A quick game made for Ludum Dare 42 Compo (make a game in 48 hours, all by yourself). Delve into your enemy's stronghold and defeat them for your own Samurai-y purposes! Features 3 classes (picked at random at start), with three skills, four enemy types, two bosses, levelling up, and turn-based, grid-based hack-and-slash goodness!

Does not feature: nice art, animations, juice, sound, or (much) music. Or story.

Participated in the Compo? Wanna give my game a score or a review? Check it out here;

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/samurai-delve

Thanks!
